mapper.select:
SELECT a.vid, a.title, a.create_ymd as createYmd, a.grade, a.sort , a.channel_id as channelId, b.title as channelTitle, a.thumbnail_d as thumbnailDefault , a.thumbnail_m as thumbnailMedium, a.thumbnail_h as thumbnailHigh, a.publishedAt, a.regid as userId, a.upddt as updDt FROM tb_shorts_ccm a inner join tb_origin_vid b on a.channel_id = b.channel_id where 1=1 and a.del_yn = 'N'
AND a.channel_id = #{channelId}
AND a.title like concat('%', nullif(#{keyword}, ''), '%')
AND a.vid like concat('%', nullif(#{keyword}, ''), '%')
order by a.upddt desc
LIMIT 50
mapper.update: INSERT INTO tb_shorts_ccm (vid, channel_id, title, channel_title, thumbnail_d, thumbnail_m, thumbnail_h , grade, sort, description, create_ymd, publishedAt, regid, regdt, updid, upddt) values ( #{vid}, #{channelId}, #{title}, #{channelTitle}, #{thumbnailDefault}, #{thumbnailMedium}, #{thumbnailHigh} , #{grade}, #{sort}, #{description}, date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d'), #{publishedAt}, #{userId}, now(), #{userId}, now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE grade=#{grade}, sort=#{sort} , updid=#{userId}, upddt=current_timestamp()
update tb_shorts_ccm set del_yn = 'Y', updid=#{userId}, upddt=current_timestamp() WHERE vid=#{vid}
